data.name: Truck driving time(Level I)
data.description:
In this kata your task is to write a function which validates truck driving time. The function should return true if driver did not exceed the limits; otherwise return false. 

Limits:

- A driver cannot drive more than 4.5 hours without a 45 minute rest.

A 45 minute rest can be split into 2 parts. The first rest must be at least 15 minutes. The second rest must be at least 30 minutes rest (In that order -> 15 mins then 30 mins). Between those parts other activities can occur so long as the limits are not breached.

Function input:
```javascript
// There will be 3 types of activities "Drive","Work" and "Rest".

// Within limits: 45 minutes rest (split version).
var dailyShedule1 = [ 
                    ["7:00-10:30","Drive"],
                    ["10:30-10:45","Rest"],
                    ["10:45-11:45","Drive"],
                    ["11:45-12:15","Rest"],
                    ["12:15-16:45","Drive"],
                    ["16:45-20:15","Work"], 
                    ];
// Breach limits: 4.5 hours limit, split rest in wrong order.
var dailyShedule2 = [
                    ["5:00-7:00","Drive"],
                    ["7:00-7:30","Rest"],
                    ["7:30-10:00","Drive"],
                    ["10:00-10:15","Rest"],
                    ["10:15-11:05","Drive"],
                    ];
```
More about limits(read first paragraph)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Truck_driver#European_Union
